languages.text: "Мир скомпрометирован. Оценивать степень осквернения значит полагаться на слабые суждения склонного к сомнению и сантиментам разума. Я бы избавился и от населения, и от мира".

"This world has been compromised. Any attempt to assess the degree of corruption will necessarily be based on weak judgement vulnerable to doubt and sentiment. I would get rid of the planet and its population."
languages.original_text: "Мир скомпрометирован. Оценивать степень осквернения значит полагаться на слабые суждения склонного к сомнению и сантиментам разума. Я бы избавился и от населения, и от мира".

traits.locale_text: "This world has been compromised. Any attempt to assess the degree of corruption will necessarily be based on weak judgement vulnerable to doubt and sentiment. I would get rid of the planet and its population."

"This world has been compromised. Any attempt to assess the degree of corruption will necessarily be based on weak judgement vulnerable to doubt and sentiment. I would get rid of the planet and its population."

"This world has been compromised. Any attempt to assess the degree of corruption will necessarily be based on weak judgement vulnerable to doubt and sentiment. I would get rid of the planet and its population."

"This world has been compromised. Any attempt to assess the degree of corruption will necessarily be based on weak judgement vulnerable to doubt and sentiment. I would get rid of the planet and its population."

languages.text: “这个世界已经遭到了破坏。即便是想要评估这个世界的腐化程度，也只能基于不可靠的依据，很容易受到怀疑与其他感情因素的影响。如果是我，我会净化这颗行星，消灭行星上的所有人口。”
languages.original_text: "This world has been compromised. Any attempt to assess the degree of corruption will necessarily be based on weak judgement vulnerable to doubt and sentiment. I would get rid of the planet and its population."

traits.locale_text: “这个世界已经遭到了破坏。即便是想要评估这个世界的腐化程度，也只能基于不可靠的依据，很容易受到怀疑与其他感情因素的影响。如果是我，我会净化这颗行星，消灭行星上的所有人口。”

languages.text: «Este mundo está perdido. Cualquier intento de evaluar su nivel de corrupción se basará en un juicio débil y vulnerable a las dudas y los sentimientos. Recomiendo librarnos del planeta y su población».
languages.original_text: "This world has been compromised. Any attempt to assess the degree of corruption will necessarily be based on weak judgement vulnerable to doubt and sentiment. I would get rid of the planet and its population."

traits.locale_text: «Este mundo está perdido. Cualquier intento de evaluar su nivel de corrupción se basará en un juicio débil y vulnerable a las dudas y los sentimientos. Recomiendo librarnos del planeta y su población».

languages.text: 「この世界は堕落しています。腐敗の度合いを評価しようとする試みは、必然的に疑いや感情に影響されやすい弱い判断に基づいたものになるでしょう。私なら惑星とその住民を取り除くでしょう」
languages.original_text: "This world has been compromised. Any attempt to assess the degree of corruption will necessarily be based on weak judgement vulnerable to doubt and sentiment. I would get rid of the planet and its population."

traits.locale_text: 「この世界は堕落しています。腐敗の度合いを評価しようとする試みは、必然的に疑いや感情に影響されやすい弱い判断に基づいたものになるでしょう。私なら惑星とその住民を取り除くでしょう」

languages.text: « Ce monde a été compromis. Toute tentative visant à en estimer le niveau de corruption sera nécessairement basée sur un jugement défaillant, exposé au doute et aux émotions. Je me débarrasserais de la planète et de sa population. »
languages.original_text: "This world has been compromised. Any attempt to assess the degree of corruption will necessarily be based on weak judgement vulnerable to doubt and sentiment. I would get rid of the planet and its population."

traits.locale_text: « Ce monde a été compromis. Toute tentative visant à en estimer le niveau de corruption sera nécessairement basée sur un jugement défaillant, exposé au doute et aux émotions. Je me débarrasserais de la planète et de sa population. »

languages.text: "Diese Welt wurde kompromittiert. Jeder Versuch einer Einschätzung des Ausmaßes der Verderbnis muss auf schwachem Urteilsvermögen und Anfälligkeit für Zweifel und Gefühle beruhen. Ich würde mich des Planeten und seiner Bevölkerung entledigen."
languages.original_text: "This world has been compromised. Any attempt to assess the degree of corruption will necessarily be based on weak judgement vulnerable to doubt and sentiment. I would get rid of the planet and its population."

traits.locale_text: "Diese Welt wurde kompromittiert. Jeder Versuch einer Einschätzung des Ausmaßes der Verderbnis muss auf schwachem Urteilsvermögen und Anfälligkeit für Zweifel und Gefühle beruhen. Ich würde mich des Planeten und seiner Bevölkerung entledigen."

languages.text: "Bu dünyanın kutsallığı ihlal edildi. Yozlaşmanın derecesine dair alınacak tüm kararlarda, şüpheye ve duygusallığa karşı kaçınılmaz olarak savunmasız olan, zayıf değerlendirmeler baz alınacaktır. Ben bu gezegenden de, nüfusundan da kurtulurdum."
languages.original_text: "This world has been compromised. Any attempt to assess the degree of corruption will necessarily be based on weak judgement vulnerable to doubt and sentiment. I would get rid of the planet and its population."

traits.locale_text: "Bu dünyanın kutsallığı ihlal edildi. Yozlaşmanın derecesine dair alınacak tüm kararlarda, şüpheye ve duygusallığa karşı kaçınılmaz olarak savunmasız olan, zayıf değerlendirmeler baz alınacaktır. Ben bu gezegenden de, nüfusundan da kurtulurdum."
